Description.Text: Facilities The hotel features 220 accommodation units. Services and facilities at the hotel include internet access, wireless internet access, a restaurant, a dining area, a bar and a conference room. Guests can use the parking spaces if required. Rooms The hotel offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. The accommodation units each feature a double bed. In addition, a fridge and tea and coffee making equipment are available. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone and wireless internet access. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment A gym is among the leisure options available to guests.
